articles.description: McGregor has his sights set on another reign as lightweight champion - but the Irishman will face stiff competition
articles.content:
Conor McGregor may have his sights set on a long reign as lightweight champion - but he'll likely first have to overcome the dominant man in the division.
The Irishman takes on Dustin Poirier next w… [+2102 chars]

articles.author: Kieran Jackson
articles.title: Spanish media SLAM Eden Hazard's performance in Real Madrid's defeat to Athletic Bilbao - Daily Mail
articles.description: Spanish paper AS went so far as to say that the winger's spell at Madrid is 'going from bad to worse', insisting he has 'no place' in Zinedine Zidane's team - Hazard was substituted after 67 minutes.
articles.content:
Eden Hazard has been slammed in the Spanish media for his lacklustre performance during Real Madrid's defeat at Athletic Bilbao in the Spanish Super Cup semi-finals. 
Bilbao stormed into a 2-0 lead … [+2591 chars]

articles.author: Simon Jones
articles.title: Everton keen on loan swoop for Bayern Munich striker Joshua Zirkzee - which could become permanent - Daily Mail
articles.description: He was due to join Frankfurt on a temporary deal but they signed Luka Jovic from Real Madrid this week. Cologne have also enquired, while Everton could make any loan move permanent.
articles.content:
Everton are exploring a loan deal for Bayern Munich's fiery young striker Joshua Zirkzee.
The 6ft 4in Dutch forward is facing a three game suspension in Germany after kicking 1860 Munich keeper Marc… [+1514 chars]
